dcterms:description: A full-scale low-voltage research facility designed for testing smart grid technologies and applications.
dcterms:title: Smart Grid Technology Lab (SGTL)

dcterms:creator: A. Spina
dcterms:description: A testing approach that integrates hardware components with real-time simulations to evaluate smart grid applications.
dcterms:title: Power Hardware-in-the-loop (PHIL)

dcterms:creator: R. Brandl
J. Montoya
D. Strauss-Mincu
M. Calin
dcterms:description: A testing concept that allows for holistic investigations of power systems by integrating various components and simulations.
dcterms:title: Power System-in-the-Loop testing concept

dcterms:creator: S. Meinecke
A. Spina
M. Calin
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset of electric power systems designed to facilitate the comparison of innovative solutions based on power flow analysis.
dcterms:title: SimBench
